long_description: bloom marketing concepts, llc (bmc) was founded by mitchell bloom in january 2010 as a privately held corporation. mitchell has been providing marketing and promotional product solutions since 1986 for industries as varied as technology, restaurant chains, airlines, healthcare, government, real estate development and pharma just to name a few. we deliver global product sourcing, online and traditional marketing support, company stores and most any product you can imagine. by using a tangible product such as apparel, awards, business gifts, etc. your message is bound to have a long lasting impact. looking for a specific item or just browsing for ideas. our extensive range of promo products will ensure you find something to suit your requirements. put our knowledge about promotional products to work for you. with high quality promotional products, fast delivery times, and prices to fit all budgets, we will provide customized, relevant recommendations for you. the patented & exclusive stack cup is ingeniously designed and the unique handle allows you to carry.
